body:
Hello everyone, 

I'm trying to learn honeybee and ladybug with Chris Mackey tutorial on YouTube

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=92cyBvHPSDs&index=19&list=U...](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=92cyBvHPSDs&index=19&list=UUc6HWbF4UtdKdjbZ2tvwiCQ), 

I have the error "1. Solution exception:'Brep' object has no attribute 'Vertices' " with the component **HoneyBee Indoor View Factor Calculator.**

How can I fix it please?

Thanks,

Ilona
topic: HoneyBee Energy Modeling - Object has no attribute error
